alert.note: Alert for Greene (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 22 at 5:30PM CDT until March 22 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Greene, Pickens and Sumter. * WHEN...Until 630 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to slow moving thunderstorms. This will cause flooding of low lying areas, creeks, and streams. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Livingston, Eutaw, York, Aliceville, Pickensville, Cuba, Boligee, Union, Gainesville, Epes, Emelle, Memphis, McMullen, The University Of West Alabama, Bluffport, New West Greene, Boyd, West Greene, Allison and Tishabee.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
